flavor_text_entries.black:
This Pokémon fought humans in order
to protect its friends. Legends about it
continue to be passed down.
flavor_text_entries.white:
Its head sprouts horns as sharp as
blades. Using whirlwind-like movements,
it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Legends say this Pokémon
confounded opponents with
its swift movements.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Legends say this Pokémon
confounded opponents with
its swift movements.

Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using
whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly
cuts opponents.
flavor_text_entries.y:
Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents
with its swift movements.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using
whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly

flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents
with its swift movements.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
A legend tells of this Pokémon working
together with Cobalion and Terrakion to
protect the Pokémon of the Unova region.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
It darts around opponents with a flurry of quick
movements, slicing them up with its horns.
